short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension for adding knak emails to Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Knak gives marketers the tools to create beautiful, on-brand emails, and seamlessly integrates with marketing automation platforms such as Marketo, Eloqua and Salesforce Marketing Cloud, along with hundreds of email sending platforms. 

Now with Knak for Google Chrome™, you can ensure your brand reaches every corner of your organization. By installing this extension, you’ll give everyone across your company - from your internal comms team, legal team, executive team, customer experience team, sales team and HR team - the power to send incredible, on brand emails through your email service provider at the click of a button.

Currently compatible with: Gmail
